main event: An observer reported seeing a floating object at a 225-degree azimuth and a 60-degree elevation near Roann, Indiana on June 8, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared to float and bob over a relatively small area., The object was about 30 feet in diameter and observed for about 5-6 minutes., There were multiple reported sightings in the vicinity, involving neighbors and friends., The witness expressed fear of adverse publicity regarding the sighting., The preliminary analysis suggested the sighting was likely a B-58 aircraft using afterburners while landing.
witness description: Mrs. [REDACTED], 28, a housewife from the area
